subject: Data
title: Netflix and the Data-Driven Hit
description: A fast breakdown of Netflix and the Data-Driven Hit for builders.

hook.text: House of Cards wasn't a creative gamble. Netflix already knew it would be a hit before filming began.

buildup.text: Netflix analyzed viewing data: users who liked the original UK show also loved Kevin Spacey and David Fincher.

discovery.text: They spent $100 million on the show based on data â€” not pilot episodes, not focus groups.

twist.text: Traditional studios test shows with small audiences. Netflix tested with 100 million data points.

climax.text: House of Cards became a massive hit, proving data could drive creative decisions.
